Flicker put the finishing touches on it, sticking a
gatling gun on the side as a final precation.

Flicker:  Properly modified, with just a littl armor
and weapons, this would make a great tank.

He started helping Gatara load up.

--- cardhead649 <cardhead649@...> wrote:
> "There," Gatara rumbles as she finishes stacking
> assorted crates of 
> engine components by the door.  "That'll do for the
> first load."  She 
> keys her comm.  "Gatara to base, how are things
> going there?"
> 
> "The girl's all packed," Riekan replies, his voice
> somewhat distorted 
> by static.
> 
> "I imagine that took about three cycles," Gatara
> chuckles.  "We'll be 
> over there soon with the first batch of gear - just
> as soon as this 
> bug rigs up the transport."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> wrote:
> > Flicker continued building the transport, slipping
> an
> > exposive in right under the area for the cargo,
> and
> > hiding the detonator in his wrist compartment, as
> a
> > trump card incase of double-cross.
> 
> 
>
